param.script:
#
#   NOTE : Enter "Out Table Alias"
#   ex)
#       inputDataframe = inputs[0]
#       result = inputDataframe

import pandas as pd

from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split

df=inputs[0]

train, test= train_test_split(df, train_size=0.7, random_state=123, stratify=df.species)

tr_head = train.head()

tr_count = pd.DataFrame(train.species.value_counts())
